Package limitedlibrarymanagementsystem

Class Student

java.lang.Object
limitedlibrarymanagementsystem.Student
public class Student extends Object
Class to define Student objects. As required per final project problem statement. Final Project for Programming Patterns course - Fall 2021.

    • viewCatalog

      public Map<String,String> viewCatalog() throws Exception
      This method returns a map containing all data retrieved from the Books table.The key in the map is “SN”. All books should be sorted by “SN”.
      Returns:
      map containing books
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • borrow

      public Boolean borrow(Book book) throws Exception
      If the book is available to be borrowed, the number of copies(“Quantity”) will be decreased by one and the number of Copies issued (“Issued”) will be increased by one. A new entry in “IssuedBooks” table is added.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be borrowed
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully issued.
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • toReturn

      public Boolean toReturn(Book book) throws Exception
      If the book information for that student is valid, the number of copies “Quantity” will be increased by one and the number of copies issued will be decreased by one. The corresponding record in IssuedBooks table is deleted from the table.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be returned
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully returned
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown
